name: Ritz-Hell Mod
description:
Ritz has gotten a little bit old over the past months. That's why I tried making a Hell mod.

- Gave Ritz a gun (doesn't shoot)

-Made Ritz red

-The rats want cheese covered ammo (replaces texture of cheese)

-Replaces background and foreground to look hellish

-cracks have lava dripping down

-replaces music

U need to give ammo to the rat gang to destroy the beast... THE SNAKE.
